channel.title: Delta scape ammount of connections allowed
channel.description:
Okay, i am trying to remove the ammount of connections per ip, so i can double client, and im using delta, how would i remove it, k thanks.
~greg

item.title: Delta scape ammount of connections allowed
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

In server.java change ## too max connections before autoban.

if (num > ##) { banHost(host, num); return false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Delta scape ammount of connections allowed
